amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds from being used for the Office of Clean Energy Demonstrations of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Van Drew.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273 (Roll no. 377).
